Readme

1) How to turn on tracing. 

a) Rename the Example.MapMgr.exe.config file to MapMgr.exe.config
b) Place MapMgr.exe.config into the Plugins directory next to the MapMgr.exe file.
c) When MapMgr.exe is loaded as a plugin it will create a TraceMMPlugin.txt file.
d) When MapMgr.exe is run stand alone it will ALSO create a TraceMMApp.txt file.

  >>> NOTE: DO NOT SHIP WITH A CONFIG FILE THAT HAS TRACING TURNED ON TO HITS HIGHEST LEVEL <<<
